alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 28 at 1:04PM MST until November 29 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, locally higher in the Cottonwood Canyons. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected across all mountain routes including both the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. Traction laws may be enacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An area of moderate to heavy snow is expected near and behind a cold front this afternoon into this evening. Periods of snow will continue through the overnight hours. There is the increasing likelihood that portions of the Cottonwood Canyons will see periods of moderate to heavy snow in association with a lake band impacting eastern Salt Lake County Monday night into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
